name: Crackman
description:
We revisit Pacman 20 years later after all his fame and glory has passed. Pacman has become Crackman, using his weekends visiting the town bars.

Use the arrow keys to guide Crackman around the levels. Make sure to eat just enough pills and survive until the time runs out. If he eats to many pills, he will overdose, but if he doesn't eat enough he will die from withdrawal symptoms.
